verses.verse: וַנֵּ֜פֶן <S%H6437><s%> van-Ne-fen Then we turned וַנִּסַּ֤ע <S%H5265><s%> van-nis-Sa' and took our journey הַמִּדְבָּ֙רָה֙ <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Ba-rah into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> yam- sea ס֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> Suf, of the Red כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me וַנָּ֥סָב <S%H5437><s%> van-Na-sov unto me and we compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- mount שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir Seir יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim. many ס sa-Mek

רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- long enough לָכֶ֕ם la-Chem סֹ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> so Ye have compassed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har this mountain הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this פְּנ֥וּ <S%H6437><s%> pe-Nu turn לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem צָפֹֽנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah. you northward

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am thou the people צַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> tzav And command לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem You עֹֽבְרִ֗ים <S%H5674><s%> 'oe-Rim, Ye [are] to pass בִּגְבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> big-Vul through the coast אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Chem of your brethren בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- the children עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, of Esau הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim which dwell בְּשֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> be-se-'Ir; in Seir וְיִֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> ve-yi-re-'U and they shall be afraid מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem, at וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> ve-nish-mar-Tem heed מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. of you take ye good

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּתְגָּר֣וּ <S%H1624><s%> tit-ga-Ru Meddle בָ֔ם Vam, כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I will not אֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten not with them for I will not give לָכֶם֙ la-Chem מֵֽאַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-Tzam, you of their land עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad even מִדְרַ֣ךְ <S%H4096><s%> mid-Rach breadth כַּף־ <S%H3709><s%> kaf- branch רָ֑גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Ra-gel; no not so much as a foot כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because יְרֻשָּׁ֣ה <S%H3425><s%> ye-rush-Shah [for] a possession לְעֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> le-'e-Sav, unto Esau נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti because I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har mount שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir. Seir

אֹ֣כֶל <S%H400><s%> 'O-chel meat תִּשְׁבְּר֧וּ <S%H7666><s%> tish-be-Ru Ye shall buy מֵֽאִתָּ֛ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> bak-Ke-sef of them for money וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֑ם <S%H398><s%> va-'a-chal-Tem; that ye may eat וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- shall also מַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim water תִּכְר֧וּ <S%H3739><s%> tich-Ru and ye shall also buy מֵאִתָּ֛ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> bak-Ke-sef of them for money וּשְׁתִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H8354><s%> u-she-ti-Tem. that ye may drink

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki For יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בֵּֽרַכְךָ֗ <S%H1288><s%> be-rach-Cha, hath blessed בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh thee in all the works יָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-cha, of thy hand יָדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' he knoweth לֶכְתְּךָ֔ <S%H1980><s%> lech-te-Cha, your wanderings אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּדְבָּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar wilderness הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol through this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this זֶ֣ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh These אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im these forty שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, with לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo have not חָסַ֖רְתָּ <S%H2637><s%> cha-Sar-ta [hath been] with thee thou hast lacked דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. nothing

וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֞ר <S%H5674><s%> van-na-'a-Vor And when we passed מֵאֵ֧ת <S%H854><s%> me-'Et for אַחֵ֣ינוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-nu by from our brethren בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children עֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, of Esau הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-she-Vim which dwelt בְּשֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> be-se-'Ir, in Seir מִדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> mid-De-rech through the way הָֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <S%H6160><s%> ha-'a-ra-Vah, of the plain מֵאֵילַ֖ת <S%H359><s%> me-'ei-Lat from Elath וּמֵעֶצְיֹ֣ן u-me-'etz-Yon גָּ֑בֶר <S%H6100><s%> Ga-ver; and from Eziongaber ס sa-Mek וַנֵּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H6437><s%> van-Ne-fen we turned וַֽנַּעֲבֹ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> van-na-'a-Vor, and passed דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar of the wilderness מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av. of Moab

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about אֶל־ <S%H408><s%> 'el- nor תָּ֙צַר֙ <S%H6696><s%> ta-tzar unto me Distress אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, not the Moabites וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nor תִּתְגָּ֥ר <S%H1624><s%> tit-Gar neither contend בָּ֖ם bam מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah; with them in battle כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I will not אֶתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten for I will not give לְךָ֤ le-Cha מֵֽאַרְצוֹ֙ <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-Tzo thee of their land יְרֻשָּׁ֔ה <S%H3425><s%> ye-rush-Shah, [for] a possession כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- unto the children ל֔וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot, of Lot נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti because I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָ֖ר <S%H6144><s%> 'ar Ar יְרֻשָּׁה׃ <S%H3425><s%> ye-rush-shah [for] a possession

וּבְשֵׂעִ֞יר <S%H8165><s%> u-ve-se-'Ir in Seir יָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu also dwelt הַחֹרִים֮ <S%H2752><s%> ha-cho-Rim The Horims לְפָנִים֒ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim beforetime וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei but the children עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav of Esau יִֽירָשׁ֗וּם <S%H3423><s%> yi-ra-Shum, succeeded וַיַּשְׁמִידוּם֙ <S%H8045><s%> vai-yash-mi-Dum them when they had destroyed מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Hem, them from before וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu them and dwelt תַּחְתָּ֑ם <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tam; their place כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah did יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, in their stead as Israel לְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> le-'E-retz unto the land יְרֻשָּׁת֔וֹ <S%H3425><s%> ye-rush-sha-To, of his possession אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam Moreover יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- For indeed the hand יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הָ֣יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-ye-tah become בָּ֔ם Bam, לְהֻמָּ֖ם <S%H2000><s%> le-hum-Mam was against them to destroy מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> mik-Ke-rev them from among הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh; the host עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until תֻּמָּֽם׃ <S%H8552><s%> tum-Mam. until they were consumed
